amendment.description: An amendment numbered 103 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to reduce the salary of Ya-Wei (Jake) Li, Deputy Assistant Administrator for Pesticide Programs to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 263 (Roll no. 586).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Miller (IL) amendment (A054) Failed by recorded vote: 151 - 263 (Roll no. 586).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
